# Interview Checklist (one question at a time)

## Context
- Who is the user? What's broken today? What triggers usage?

## Goals
- Top 1-3 goals, measurable success metrics, time horizon

## Users & Permissions
- Roles, permission boundaries, admin operations

## Scope
- MVP boundaries, explicit non-goals, assumptions, constraints

## Functional
- Entities, state machines, workflows, edge cases, error handling

## Data
- Inputs/outputs, schemas, IDs, validation, versioning

## Integrations
- Systems, auth, rate limits, failure semantics, retries

## NFRs
- Performance, reliability, observability, security, privacy/compliance

## UX
- Screens/steps, empty/error states, accessibility/i18n

## Delivery
- Architecture sketch, milestones, testing, rollout, risks
